# 参照iview的ui库，用vue框架实现一个from组件

顺带实现了自定义组件的v-model

<template>
  <div class="container">
    <sky-form :model="form" :rules="rules">
     <sky-form-item label="用户名" prop="name">
       <sky-input v-model="form.name" name='name'></sky-input>
     </sky-form-item>
     <sky-form-item label="年龄" prop="age">
       <sky-input v-model="form.age" name='age'></sky-input>
     </sky-form-item>
   </sky-form>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
import SkyForm from "../components/sky-form.vue";
import SkyFormItem from "../components/sky-form-item.vue";
import SkyInput from "../components/sky-input.vue";
export default {
  components: {
    SkyForm,
    SkyFormItem,
    SkyInput
  },
  data() {
    return {
      form: {
        name: "",
        age: ""
      },
      rules: {
        name: [
          { required: true, message: "用户名不能为空" },
          { maxLength: 10, message: "用户名长度要小于10" }
        ],
        age: { required: true, message: "年龄不能为空" }
      }
    };
  }
};
</script>

<style lang="less" scoped>

</style>

<template>
  <form>
    <slot></slot>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  provide() {
    return {
      form: this
    };
  },
  name: "Skyform",
  props:{
    model:{
      type:Object
    },
    rules:{
      type:Object
    },
  }
};
</script>

<style>
</style>

<template>
 <div>
   <label v-if="label">{{label}}</label>
    <div>
      <slot></slot>
      <p v-if="validateStatus=='error'" class='error'>
        {{errorMessage}}
      </p>
    </div>
 </div>
</template>

<script>
export default{
  name:"SkyFormItem",
  inject:['form'],
  data(){
    return {
      validateStatus:'',
      errorMessage:''
    }
  },
  created(){
    this.$bus.$on('skyFormItem',(value)=>{
      this.validate(value)
    })
  },
  methods:{
    getRules(){
      let formRules = this.form.rules[this.prop]
      return formRules
    },
    
    validate(obj){
      if(obj.name !== this.prop){
        return 
      }
      const rule = this.getRules()
      const value = this.form.model[this.prop]
      if(Array.isArray(rule)){
        rule.forEach(v=>{
          if(v.required && !value){
            this.errorMessage = v.message
            this.validateStatus = 'error'
          }
          if(v.maxLength && value.length>v.maxLength){
            this.errorMessage = v.message
            this.validateStatus = 'error'
          }
        })
      }else{
        if(rule.required && !value){
        this.errorMessage = rule.message
        this.validateStatus = 'error'
        }else{
          this.validateStatus = 'validating'
        }
      }
    }
  },
  props:{
    label:{
      type:String,
    },
    prop:{
      type:String
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>
p.error{
  color:red;
}
</style>

<template>
  <input type="text" :value='inputValue' @input='handleInput'>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "SkyInput",
  props: {
    value: {
      type: String,
      default: "",
      required: true
    },
    name:{
      type:String
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      inputValue: this.value
    };
  },
  methods: {
    handleInput(e) {
      const value = e.target.value;
      this.$emit("input", value);
      this.$bus.$emit("skyFormItem", {
        value,
        name: this.name
      });
    }
  }
};
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped>
</style>
